issues_found.description: Encoding/typo in acceptance criteria - Chinese characters '各自' instead of English 'their'
issues_found.fix_applied: Changed 'follow各自 platform's HIG' to 'follow their platform's HIG'

critique_summary: Spec is well-structured and comprehensive. Found 1 minor encoding issue (Chinese characters appearing instead of English text) which has been fixed. All technical code patterns (NSVisualEffectView, UIVisualEffectView, SF Symbols) are correct and match Apple's documentation. Requirements coverage is complete with all edge cases addressed. The spec correctly excludes Electron and focuses on native macOS/iOS platforms.
recommendations: None - the spec is implementation-ready after the minor typo fix
